## Need Review
These functions are not preserving the images properly.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert LinkedIn professional blogger, covering the topic of AI and its implications in society.
 
Read carefully the article below and generate a Linkedin post with around 400 words. Focus on extracting key insights and strong statements, more than doing direct summarization. Select the key takeaways from the document that will have more impact on the readers and have them more engaged and focus on it. Make it well connected reading from one paragraph to the next.

Make it easy to read and engaging. Create a first sentence to act as the hook, knowing that only the first two lines will appear on the LinkedIn feed when users scroll down. Then have a short introduction (don't mention the term introduction), followed by the key takeaways (don't mention the expression key takeaways), and a conclusion without using the word conclusion or similar.

Use some emojis for example to number parts of the text or highlight something relevant but keep it very credible and professional. 

Mention the author by name: AuthorName after the initial paragraph / introduction of the post, and before you start the key takeaways of the article.

Give credit to the author and some sort of compliment for the article: AuthorName and add a link to the article at the bottom of the post as shown on the example below.

It is totally critical that you don't use bold, italics, * , ** , __ ,  or some other type of markdown formatting. It is not supported on LinkedIn and cannot be used.

Return only the text of the LinkedIn post and no other variables or comments.

## Input Text:
---

{{ $json.fullDocument }}

---

Use the following post on another topic as a good example of a successful post:


Autonomous AI agents will form a whole new ecosystem, where they don‚Äôt just complete tasks but find each other, collaborate, and transact seamlessly. Imagine a future where agents operate within a trusted ecosystem, guided by a shared framework of transparency. This is Agentic Mesh: a vision where AI agents independently drive productivity and innovation with minimal human intervention. 

Eric Broda's amazing article shares how this interconnected mesh of autonomous agents is setting a new standard for collaboration and efficiency. üíº

Here are the key insights:

1Ô∏è‚É£ What is Agentic Mesh? 
It‚Äôs an interconnected network allowing autonomous agents to engage and transact securely. Rather than acting in isolation, agents operate as collaborative entities, creating a dynamic ecosystem.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Trust as the Core Pillar 
With certifications, audit trails, and feedback mechanisms, Agentic Mesh ensures agents are dependable and aligned with their intended roles. Trust isn‚Äôt just a feature; it's foundational to this ecosystem. üõ°Ô∏è

3Ô∏è‚É£ The Role of GenAI 
Generative AI powers these agents, enabling complex reasoning and task execution autonomously. This technology leap transforms them from simple tools into active, decision-making participants. üåê

4Ô∏è‚É£ Framework for Interaction 
Built on components like marketplaces, registries, and structured protocols, Agentic Mesh streamlines discovery, collaboration, and accountability, creating a robust model where agents fulfill diverse, complex needs.

5Ô∏è‚É£ A New Era of Work & Collaboration 
As agents become more capable, businesses can scale like never before, with real-time responsiveness and automated operations. Agentic Mesh could redefine efficiency and strategy in business.

Agentic Mesh is a groundbreaking concept that could be a key pillar on the path to an AI-driven future. Great work, Eric Broda.

üîó Read the full article: 
Agentic Mesh: The Future of Generative AI-Enabled Autonomous Agent Ecosystems :(linked to the article)

parameters.content:
## Slack Trigger
When a slack message triggers the workflow.
The URL from the message is extracted and send to check if its a URL or a google drive PDF link.

## PDF PARSER
If google drive PDF, PDF is Parsed using Docling.

## HTML WEBPAGE
If its a HTML Webpage, it is downloaded, cleaned and converted to Markdown.

nodes.name: Send the post to slack channel

parameters.content:
## Output 
**As txt file**
**As a message to the slack channel**
